featured.text: One of the first European books to be printed in movable type was Johannes Gutenberg's 42-line Bible.

definition.zh_def: 古騰堡，指約翰·古騰堡，一位德國發明家，以發明活字印刷術而聞名，對書籍的生產和知識的傳播產生了重大影響。
definition.en_def: Gutenberg refers to Johannes Gutenberg, a German inventor known for introducing movable type printing, which significantly impacted the production of books and the dissemination of knowledge.
definition.example: Gutenberg's invention of the printing press revolutionized the way information was shared.
